content.text: I'm so upset! I saw my neighbor abusing his dog today.
Oh my gosh, that's terrible! What kind of dog was it?
A golden retriever. He was just being so mean to him.
I'm so sorry you had to see that. I love dogs, and I hate to see them abused.
Me too. I wish I could do something about it.
Maybe you could call the animal control?
I thought about it, but I'm not sure if they would do anything.
It's worth a shot. At least they could go and check on the dog.
Yeah, I think I will. I can't stand to think about him being abused anymore.
Good for you! I'm sure the dog will appreciate it.
Me too. Thanks for talking to me about this.
No problem. I'm always happy to help
